title: WTHNsider
description: WTHN is the modern Acupuncture & TCM clinic, with locations throughout NYC. We make the transformative, science-backed benefits of Acupuncture easier to access, helping you to find relief from everyday stress and pain.
cleaned_text: Our Blog [WTHNsider](/blogs/wthnside-out) Traditional Chinese Medicine Herbs List to Improve Overall Health [](/blogs/wthnside-out/the-benefits-of-herbal-medicine-power-of-plants) [The Benefits of Herbal Medicine: Power of Plants](/blogs/wthnside-out/the-benefits-of-herbal-medicine-power-of-plants) If I asked you to name a few
